question: The National Tiger Conservation Authority (NTCA) has recently imposed a 5-year ban on BBC. NTCA is the statutory body of which union ministry?
option1: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
option2: Ministry of Water Resources, River Development and Ganga Rejuvenation
option4: Ministry of Environment, Forests and Climate Change
answer: Ministry of Environment, Forests and Climate Change
